TopicTitle: how to acces the debug menu

Articles.Content: alt plus f12 dosent work for me im using a windows pc so im not sure whats wrong
If you are using Geforce drivers, Press alt+z and change KeyBindings in the keyboard settings so that there is no key bound for alt+f12.
As abastro says, this kind of thing is almost always a problem with another background app grabbing that key for itself.
